question: Does BunnAgain offer boarding or vet services?
answer: No, BunnAgain does not provide boarding or veterinary services for the community. We recommend Avian & Exotic Animal Hospital of Louisiana and Azalea Lakes Veterinary Clinic for rabbit care in the southern Louisiana area.

question: Does BunnAgain take in animals?
answer: We are not an open intake shelter, so you cannot bring your rabbits to our facility without approval. We rely on a network of fosters to provide temporary care for rabbits in need. If you are in a situation where you need to re-home your rabbit, please contact us. While we may not be able to take in your rabbit directly, we will be more than happy to share your situation on our social media platforms to help you find assistance.

question: What kind of pets does BunnAgain have?
answer: BunnAgain primarily has rabbits of all life stages available for adoption. Our rabbits are socialized to be indoor pets only. We encourage you to review our available adoption gallery on our website and fill out an application if you are interested in adopting one of our rabbits.
